projects.name: Muralville
projects.description: Muralville, a murals finder app, is my love letter to the talented mural artists in Nashville, TN. This app allows users to find, add, and keep track of their favorite murals around the city. Built with React using a flat-data structure in Firebase. The Leaflet API was used for the map component and ESRI and Bing Maps for GeoSearch and Autosuggest capabilities. Modals and forms created using Reactstrap.
projects.technologies: React, Axios, Firebase, JavaScript, SASS, Reactstrap, Leaflet

projects.name: Band Aid
projects.description: Band Aid was my full-stack capstone at NSS. It is a networking platform to connect bands to musicians, and allow them to setup practice and show events, and messaging.
projects.technologies: C#, ASP.NET Core, Dapper, React, Axios, Firebase, JavaScript, SASS, Reactstrap

projects.name: Magic E8 Ball
projects.description: Magic E8 Ball is a recruiting tool for hiring managers looking to hire junior developers. This project grew out of my desire to get more experience with React, and to explore making shapes with raw CSS.

projects.name: Skull & Daisy
projects.description: Skull & Daisy - a group project as NSS - is a storefront webapp. My duties involved acting as Scrum Master and providing the Users and PaymentType models and API controllers using repository design pattern. On the front end, my primary contributions included writing authentication procedures using Firebase, implementing a seller dashboard to display sales history, and providing inventory management methods.
projects.technologies: C#, ASP.NET Core, Dapper, React, Axios, Firebase, JavaScript, SASS, Reactstrap

projects.name: The Runs
projects.description: My take on a personal runs tracking tool. I wanted to track my own runs without the pop-ups and social media aspects of Strava.
projects.technologies: C#, ASP.NET Core, MongoDB, React, Reactstap
